Page 1770

call me in the warden's office.

Charisma Edge
Associate Warden
MCC New York
150 Park Row
New York, NY 10007
646-836-6300 ext [b(6); (b)(7)(C)]
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov
NYM/AW-Programs--[b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov

>>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov> 12/6/2019 3:22 PM >>>

Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

------- Original message -------
From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>
Date: 12/6/19 3:05 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>
Cc: [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>
Subject: Media inquiry - due today - NY Daily News - re: conditions at MCC NY post-Epstein

>>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] 2/06/2019 15:05 >>>
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]

Here is a very rough draft for you and your staff to enhance if possible very quickly today. I can then run by [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] and my boss before I answer the reporter. Feel free to te

Thanks,
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]

Reporter: [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] NY DAILY NEWS

Questions & Proposed Responses:

Hello, I'm working on a story about morale at MCC in Manhattan in the wake of charges agains [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] . I've spoken to an AFGE union official and

The thrust of the story is that morale has plummeted at the facility in the wake of the falsification of documents charges. Morale was already bad because of staffing issues.

(1) Has any money been allocated for improving MCC as a facility since Epstein's death?
[b(5)]

(2) Has there been a hiring surge since Epstein's suicide?
[b(5)] [b(6); (b)(7)(C)]

(3) Any changes in BOP policies following Epstein's suicide?
[b(5)]

(4) Is it correct that [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] were responsible for roughly 50 to 70 inmates the night of the suicide?
[b(5)]

(5) What is the attrition rate for BOP correctional officers? What's the average length of time a person stays in the job? (NYC-area would be best if it's available.)
[b(5)] [b(6); (b)(7)(C)]

(6) Can you share anything supervisors at MCC have told the rank and file in the wake of these charges? What's the message to overworked, disgruntled correctional office
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]

[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]
Public Information Office
Federal Bureau of Prisons
(202) 353-[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]

Page 9317
DOJ-OGR-00025793

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain with redacted names and contact information. The content discusses a media inquiry related to conditions at MCC NY post-Epstein's death.
